sentences.sContent: The magnificent beau is dancing to the light of chandeliers.
sentences.sContent_eng: The magnificent beau is dancing to the light of chandeliers.
sentences.sCn: 这个衣着华丽的花花公子在枝形吊灯灯光下翩翩起舞。

sentences.sContent: These magnificent ancient buildings demonstrate the great intelligence of the labouring people.
sentences.sContent_eng: These magnificent ancient buildings demonstrate the great intelligence of the labouring people.
sentences.sCn: 这些壮丽的古代建筑显示了劳动人民的高度智慧。

sentences.sContent: ...It enjoys not only the magnificent sight...
...it’s an obvious truth that we could not build a magnificent mansion without solid foundations; we could not enjoy a long travel unless we make a solid start at first...

synos.tran: 高尚的；壮丽的；华丽的；宏伟的

remMethod.val: magn(大) ＋ ificent → 宏伟的， 壮丽的
